Vibrava (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0328: Trapinch
Pokémon
#0330: Flygon →

Vibrava has been featured on 18 different cards since it debuted in the EX Dragon expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Vibrava cards are normally Fighting-type or Dragon-type Stage 1 Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Vibrava

Vibrava
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

Vibrava δ EX Holon Phantoms 54/110 Holon Phantom 002/052
Vibrava δ EX Dragon Frontiers 24/101 Offense and Defense of the Furthest Ends 036/068
Vibrava δ EX Dragon Frontiers 42/101 Imprison! Gardevoir ex Constructed Standard Deck   010/024
Vibrava EX Power Keepers 40/108 World Champions Pack 074/108
Vibrava Secret Wonders 74/132 Shining Darkness  
Vibrava Rising Rivals 53/111 Bonds to the End of Time 071/090
Vibrava Boundaries Crossed 98/149 Freeze Bolt 043/059
Vibrava Furious Fists 75/111 Rising Fist 070/096
